lines: We all come from different paths in life but we can find common ground.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373c1c7d8>

lines: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373c05c18>

lines: We must seek, above all, a world of peace; a world in which peoples dwell together in mutual respect and work together in mutual regard.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373c4ff70>

lines: By mutual respect, understanding and with good will we can find acceptable solutions to any problems which exist or may arise between us.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373c3e360>

lines: We can find common ground only by moving to higher ground.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373c87e70>

lines: I shall either find a way, or make one.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373c74938>

lines: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373cbd818>

lines: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off the goal.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373ca73b0>

lines: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373c95098>

lines: I've always believed that success for anyone is all about drive, dedication, and desire, but for me, it's also been about confidence and faith.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373cdeb58>

lines: Leaders are like gardeners... As leaders we are not only responsible for harvesting our own success but for cultivating the success of the next generation.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373cccbb0>

lines: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373d164e0>

lines: Leadership is a two-way street. Respect for one's superiors; care for one's crew.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373d04bc8>

lines: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373d4e9a8>

lines: Leave nothing for tomorrow which can be done today.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373d3caa0>

lines: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373d26688>

lines: Where there is love there is life.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373d6f9f0>

lines: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373d5c058>

lines: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373da5758>

lines: We lose ourselves in the things we love. We find ourselves there, too.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373d8fe30>

lines: Ask yourself: Have you been kind today? Make kindness your modus operandi and change your world.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373dddf68>

lines: You can always, always give something, even if it is only kindness!
author: <Author:0x00007f7373dcc538>

lines: You can be rich in spirit, kindness, love and all those things that you can't put a dollar sign on.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373db67d8>

lines: We rise by lifting others.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373e1c9e8>

lines: How do we change the world? One random act of kindness at a time.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373dee818>

lines: Inspire and bring joy to all those you know.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373e74f08>

lines: Our chief want is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373e5ee10>

lines: Promise yourself to be just as enthusiastic about the success of others as you are about your own.
author: <Author:0x00007f73732243e8>

lines: Those who are lifting the world upward and onward are those who encourage more than criticize.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373e95e10>

lines: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373e7fa70>

lines: You’ll never do a whole lot unless you’re brave enough to try.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373ece0d0>

lines: You can choose courage, or you can choose comfort, but you cannot choose both.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373eb69f8>

lines: It takes courage for people to listen to their own goodness and act on it.
author: <Author:0x00007f7373f07a38>
